data.title: harbhajan: Viral video: Inzamam ul Haq claims Harbhajan came close to converting: 'Rubbish', says Singh
data.meta_description: A controversy has erupted after a video of former Pakistan cricketer Inzamam ul Haq surfaced where he was seen claiming that he nearly got Harbhajan Singh to convert to Islam. In the video, Inzamam was seen bragging about how Pakistani players used to invite Muslim and non-Muslim players from rival teams into their dressing room and hold namaz in front of them. Sometimes, Maulanas would also be called who would try to convince others about Islam. Harbhajan Singh has now reacted to Inzamam's video calling him 'bakwaas'
data.text: A controversy has erupted after a video of former Pakistan cricketer Inzamam ul Haq surfaced where he was seen claiming that he nearly got Harbhajan Singh to convert to Islam. In the video, Inzamam was seen bragging about how Pakistani players used to invite Muslim and non-Muslim players from rival teams into their dressing room and hold namaz in front of them. Sometimes, Maulanas would also be called who would try to convince others about Islam. Harbhajan Singh has now reacted to Inzamam's video calling him 'bakwaas'
